http-request.description: This is an example of a request to retrieve a list of entities at the /terms-and-conditions endpoint

body: The loan amount is the total money borrowed by the borrower.
Interest is charged annually at the specified rate on the loan amount, usually 1.5%
The repayment term defines the duration over which the loan must be fully repaid, usually 3 months
A late payment penalty applies if installments are not paid on time.
Collateral may be required to secure the loan.
http-response.description: This is an example of a response
